title: Introducing – Mom Tudie
body:
Not known is much about **Mom Tudie**, other than he’s a 17 year old producer based in south east London, and he’s called Tom.

Since the rise of **J£ZUS MILLION,** **Disclosure,** and **Happa**, it’s now slightly easier to digest that producers tend to be incredulously young and talented, and **Mom Tudie** will no doubt join that list.

With a few tracks on his soundcloud, which you can check out [here](https://soundcloud.com/momtudie), it is Tudie’s latest effort that stands out the most; a re-work of **Nicola Thoms** ‘Make Up Your Mind’. With influences ranging from hip-hop to garage, and an underlying sense of chillstep, this track has certainly made me excited for what Mom Tudie comes out with next.

Thanks to our friends at **Music Broke My Bones** for the tip! Check out **Mom Tudie** [here](https://www.facebook.com/pages/Mom-Tudie/435356323220282)
